project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Create a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and users will interact with the application through the terminal.

task.name: Implement user interface for adding contacts
Implement storage of contacts in a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
